::Bludgeon straps himself in::

------------------------------------------------------------------------------
---------------------------------------------
::Windrazor saw that Vulois was quite upset::
Windrazor:  Dont worry, Soundwave's in the matrix now, and he died protecting 
the peace.
::Windrazor started crying himself, thinking that now he only had 4 friends 
left: The peace Angels, and hopefully Vulois::
Windrazor: I beleive it would be wise to tell the others that were alive.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------
---------------------------------------------
::Treadshot fired 10 shots from Catgut at Serge::

------------------------------------------------------------------------------
---------------------------------------------
::Bluestreak heard explosions from far off.  He transformed to sabretooth 
tiger mode and ran to the source of the noise.  he sees Striker and Spears 
getting attacked by Savage::
Bluestreak: Bluestreak, Maximize!
::He throws 4 daggers at Savages belly::
